程序包 src.main.java.Category_story6_7

类 MainController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.Category_story6_7.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Title : MainController.java Description: This JavaFX controller manages a financial transaction management system. It handles displaying, adding, deleting, and editing transactions, as well as providing budget analysis and suggestions.

  • 构造器详细资料

      public MainController()

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the main controller, setting up the table view and loading transactions. This method is called when the FXML file is loaded.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an alert dialog with an error message.
      参数:
      title - The title of the alert dialog.
      message - The error message to be displayed.

    • loadTransactions

      private void loadTransactions()
      Loads transactions from a CSV file and populates the table view. This method reads the CSV file, creates Transaction objects, and adds them to the table view.

    • handleAdd

      private void handleAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the add button click event. Opens the add transaction window and updates the table view if a new transaction is added.
      参数:
      event - The action event triggered by the button click.

    • handleDelete

      private void handleDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the delete button click event. Deletes the selected transactions from the table view and the CSV file.
      参数:
      event - The action event triggered by the button click.

    • deleteTransactionFromCSV

      private void deleteTransactionFromCSV(Transaction transaction)
      Deletes a transaction from the CSV file.
      参数:
      transaction - The transaction to be deleted.

    • handleRefresh

      private void handleRefresh(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the refresh button click event. Reloads the transactions from the CSV file and updates the table view.
      参数:
      event - The action event triggered by the button click.

    • openEditWindow

      private void openEditWindow(Transaction transaction)
      Opens the edit window for a transaction.
      参数:
      transaction - The transaction to be edited.

    • updateTransactionInCSV

      private void updateTransactionInCSV(Transaction oldTransaction, Transaction newTransaction)
      Updates a transaction in the CSV file.
      参数:
      oldTransaction - The original transaction.
      newTransaction - The updated transaction.

    • getTransactions

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Transaction> getTransactions()
      Returns the list of transactions.
      返回:
      The observable list of transactions.

    • handleSuggestion

      private void handleSuggestion(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the suggestion button click event. Opens the suggestion window.
      参数:
      event - The action event triggered by the button click.

    • handleCompare

      private void handleCompare(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the compare button click event. Checks if the current user is a VIP user and performs budget analysis if they are.
      参数:
      event - The action event triggered by the button click.

    • isCurrentUserVIP

      private boolean isCurrentUserVIP()
      Checks if the current user is a VIP user.
      返回:
      true if the user is a VIP, false otherwise.

    • showAnalysisReport

      private void showAnalysisReport(String reportText)
      Shows the analysis report in a new window.
      参数:
      reportText - The analysis report text to be displayed.

    • getCurrentMonthExpenses

      private List<Transaction> getCurrentMonthExpenses()
      Gets the current month's expenses from the table view.
      返回:
      A list of transactions representing the current month's expenses.

    • analyzeBudgetWithAI

      private String analyzeBudgetWithAI(double budget, List<Transaction> expenses) throws Exception
      Analyzes the budget with an AI service.
      参数:
      budget - The user's budget.
      expenses - The list of expenses.
      返回:
      The analysis report from the AI service.
      抛出:
      Exception - If there is an error in the analysis process.
